summary: The diff restores top-level routes and header navigation for Photos/Videos/Events (and several additional sections), but it introduces placeholder/non-functional admin management sections and appears to break existing Orders functionality by stubbing backend calls in frontend query hooks. Some unrequested UI/branding changes were also added (footer link and mandatory profile setup modal).

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin panel navigation and sections beyond Orders must provide functional UI (at least listing existing entities and create/update/delete or upload flows where applicable), not empty/placeholder content.
missing_requirements.reason: The restored admin sections shown are explicitly placeholders ("coming soon"), with disabled primary action buttons and no listing/CUD flows.

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep the existing Orders functionality working and accessible at /admin.
missing_requirements.reason: Orders data fetching/mutations are stubbed out with comments like "Backend methods don't exist yet" and mutations throw "Backend method not implemented", which would prevent Orders from functioning.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a promotional footer link to caffeine.ai (branding/attribution) not mentioned in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding external promotional links or changing footer branding in this way.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a profile setup modal that prompts authenticated users to enter their name and saves a user profile.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding a forced profile onboarding flow/modal as part of restoring sections.
